channel.title: Runserver.bat (noob Question )
channel.description:
I got the new java but dont know how to make it work with any compiler or runserver. Plz Help
sorry for The Noobish Question.

item.title: Runserver.bat (noob Question )
item.dc:creator: @S_C_A_R_Bot S C A R Bot
item.description:
@S_C_A_R_Bot wrote:

Compiler

@echo off title Compiling RaceMania ... color 0e echo Compiling game files ... "C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_02/bin/javac" *.java -d . pause

Run

@echo off title Running ... set PATH=C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat (noob Question )
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

yes but it says C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe

if your using update two you need C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat (noob Question )
item.dc:creator: @Sane Sane
item.description:
@Sane wrote:

Lol ok if u say so but it was mine cause i got update 2 n it works for meâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat (noob Question )
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

@ECHO OFF title AeroZero "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java echo.Files compiled successfully, attempting to start server.. echo. java -cp . server pause

should be

@ECHO OFF title AeroZero "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java echo.Files compiled successfully, attempting to start server.. echo. java -cp . server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat (noob Question )
item.dc:creator: @Sane Sane
item.description:
@Sane wrote:

You have JDK 6 update 2? If so right click then edit on the run.bat

and put this in

@ECHO OFF title AeroZero "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java echo.Files compiled successfully, attempting to start server.. echo. java -cp . server pause

Read full topic
